name: moci over it
description:
Use simple controls to control『moci』and reach the summit.

Climbing is the accumulation of the past, it is like life.
Here is a future waiting to be built up for you and a life of moci.
Come join us in reaching the summit.

・Click and drag to bounce the head and tail up and forward.
・Various narrations & BGMare played as the event progresses.
・You can look back at the photos and videos you have collected.
・There is an auto-save function.
・It is compatible with the joystick of the game pad (the one with two joysticks).
・You can distribute the entire game, including play screens and clear bonuses.

Half of the people who have played this game have given up,
another half of the remaining people are angry,
another half are disappointed,
and the last remaining people are lovable freaks.

To those friends I send this game, and I hope you are one of them.

This game could not have been created by me alone.
My utmost respect to the great pioneers.


"SE.BGM"
・Iwashiro Sounds works
・MusMus
・music by audionautix
・OtoLogic
・Thumbwash
